testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: The best dance school I've ever attended! The instructors are patient and skilled, and the atmosphere is so welcoming.

testimonials.name: David Lee
testimonials.comment: Started as a complete beginner and now I'm confidently dancing at social events. Highly recommend their beginner classes!

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.comment: The advanced salsa classes really helped me refine my technique. The instructors pay great attention to detail.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.comment: Great community and excellent instruction. I've made so many friends here while learning to dance.

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.comment: The bachata classes are amazing! The instructors break down complex moves in a way that's easy to understand.
